title: Bug 11516ViewForm should override computeTrim
description: Bug 11516ViewForm should override computeTrim It seems to me that, in general, any control that provides agetClientArea implementation should also override computeTrim.This also affects the fix for 10025, where minimum dimension calculationsdepend on computeTrim to correctly account for trimmings.
OB: In the current ViewForm implementation, it is not possible to calculate therequired bounds rectangle for a desired client area since computeTrim is notoverridden.
